description: Taiwanese children learn how to sort trash from the time they are in Primary 1. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: With musical trucks and chargeable trash bags, Taiwan reduces rubbish, ups recycling rate
title_page: With musical trucks and chargeable trash bags, Taiwan reduces rubbish, ups recycling rate | The Straits Times
maintext:
TAIPEI – “Is that the ice cream van?”
Several of my friends and family visiting me in Taiwan from overseas have asked me this question as soon as they hear tinny classical jingles blasting through the streets.
